channel.title: Prestige method help

item.title: Prestige method help
item.dc:creator: @ipwnurgfsass ipwnurgfsass
item.description:
@ipwnurgfsass wrote:

ok so im making a method that adds a prestige level…this is what i have but it gets an error

public int levelPrestige = 0; { if(checkCom() return resetCom(); prestige =+ 1; }
player.java:140: ‘)’ expected
if(checkCom() return resetCom();
^
1 error

if i do that i get this error

[code]player.java:140: return outside method
if(checkCom()) return resetCom();

1 error
[/code]

Read full topic
